name: Neon Commander
description:
Earth is under attack!

Alien spaceships are inbound and it's up you, the Neon Commander, to use the latest PlasmaShield technology to bounce their shots back.

Swipe the screen and draw lines to create barriers that reflect the UFO attacks and protect the city.

Different power-ups bounce the enemy's laserballs in different ways. And make sure you destroy the invaders before they reach the city.

There are a huge variety of aliens to take down, all of whom need different attacks.

Whether it's bouncing the balls off the shield wall or shooting miniature craft or blasting a giant atmospheric incinerator, the game never lets up.

Mixing Pong, Breakout and Arkanoid, this unique arcade line-drawing game is a total laugh.

Bounce your way through 32 levels of intense gameplay and 6 bosses, whilst following a jocose plot involving the banter between the head of Earth defense and the leader of the alien fleet.

A unique blend of puzzle, action and comedy awaits you, when you sign up as the Neon Commander.

Game Features

  • 32 intense levels including 6 boss battles
  • Classic retro style
  • Intuitive touch controls
  • Varied, invidious enemies
  • Hilarious plot
